# MikroTik RouterOS Basic Configuration
# Model: RB4011iGS+RM
# RouterOS Version: 7.12.1

/system identity
set name=EDGE-ROUTER-01

/system clock
set time-zone-name=America/New_York

/system ntp client
set enabled=yes

/system ntp client servers
add address=pool.ntp.org

/interface ethernet
set [ find default-name=ether1 ] name=WAN comment="ISP Uplink - 1Gbps"
set [ find default-name=ether2 ] name=LAN1 comment="Internal LAN"
set [ find default-name=ether3 ] name=LAN2 comment="Guest Network"
set [ find default-name=ether4 ] disabled=yes
set [ find default-name=ether5 ] disabled=yes

/ip address
add address=192.168.1.1/24 interface=LAN1 comment="LAN Gateway"
add address=192.168.100.1/24 interface=LAN2 comment="Guest Gateway"

/ip dhcp-client
add interface=WAN disabled=no

/ip dns
set servers=8.8.8.8,8.8.4.4 allow-remote-requests=yes

/ip pool
add name=dhcp-pool1 ranges=192.168.1.100-192.168.1.200
add name=dhcp-pool2 ranges=192.168.100.100-192.168.100.200

/ip dhcp-server
add name=dhcp1 interface=LAN1 address-pool=dhcp-pool1
add name=dhcp2 interface=LAN2 address-pool=dhcp-pool2

/ip dhcp-server network
add address=192.168.1.0/24 gateway=192.168.1.1 dns-server=192.168.1.1
add address=192.168.100.0/24 gateway=192.168.100.1 dns-server=192.168.100.1

/user
add name=netadmin group=full password=securepassword123
set admin disabled=yes
